head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths WEXLER, DAVID E., SR.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths WEXLER, DAVID E., SR.

block.p: WEXLER-David E., Sr., 77, on May 21st, 2000. Formerly a captain in NYC Fire Department, Division of Training. Mass of Christian Burial will be Thursday, May 25th, 9:30 AM, at St. Cecilia Church, Monmouth Junction, NJ. Visitation Wednesday, May 24th, 2-4 and 7-9 PM, at the M.J. Murphy Funeral Home, 616 Ridge Rd. at New Rd., Monmouth Junction. In lieu of flowers, contributions to Monmouth Junction First Aid and Rescue Squad, PO Box 5, Monmouth Junction, NJ 08852 or St. Cecilia Church, 10 Kingston La., Monmouth Junction or U.S. Marine Corps League, Freehold, NJ.

WEXLER-David E., Sr., 77, on May 21st, 2000. Formerly a captain in NYC Fire Department, Division of Training. In lieu of flowers, contributions to Monmouth Junction First Aid and Rescue Squad, PO Box 5, Monmouth Junction, NJ 08852 or St. Cecilia Church, 10 Kingston La., Monmouth Junction or U.S. Marine Corps League, Freehold, NJ.
